犥字的基本解释

犥
piāo
黄白色的牛。
苍白色的牛。
禽兽毛羽变色，失去光泽。

犥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［piāo］
［《廣韻》撫招切，平宵，滂。］
(1)黄白色牛。
(2)白苍色牛。
(3)禽畜毛羽色暗淡，没有光泽。
[②]［pào］
［《集韻》叵到切，去号，滂。］
牛名。

犥字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【牛字部】　犥； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页705第02
【廣韻】撫招切【集韻】批招切，?音漂。【說文】牛黃白色。　又【集韻】普刀切，音㯱。義同。　又【廣韻】敷沼切【集韻】匹沼切，?音縹。【玉篇】牛色不美澤。　又牛黃白色。　又【玉篇】普稾切【集韻】滂表切，?音麃。義同。　又【集韻】被表切，音莩。毛羽朱色不澤也。本作皫。詳白部皫字註。　又【集韻】滂保切。牛白蒼色。　又叵到切，音㯱。牛名。

犥字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
犥字的起名意思

暂无。

Hu
Basic explanation of words
Hu
piāo
Yellow-white cow.
Pale cow.
The feathers of animals change color and lose their luster.
Hu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [piāo]
["Guang Yun" caress and cuts, flat night, stern. ]
(1) Yellow and white cattle.
(2) Pale cow.
(3) The feathers of poultry and livestock are dull and have no luster.
[②]［pào］
["Jiyun" is cut all the time, go to the number, punky. ]
The name of the cow.
Hu

[Guang Yun] Caress and cuts [Ji Yun] Criticizes and cuts, sound drifting. [Said the text] Bezoar white.　[Jiyun] General knife cut, sound 㯱. The same meaning.　[Guangyun] Shizuma cut [Jiyun] Pose marsh cut,? Sound is illegible. [Jade articles] Bull color is not beautiful.　Bezoar and white.　[Jade articles] Puyue cut [Jiyun] Peng table cut,? Sound bar. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] is cut by the surface, sound. Hairy and vermilion are not luster. This is made of 皫. Detailed notes on the white part of the word.　[Jiyun] Pang keep cutting. The cow is pale.　Come to cut again, sound 㯱. The name of the cow.
